roleset.name: be bothered by
roleset.note: MIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mind' based on sentences in corpus and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from mind.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: mind-v
example.text: You have a right to read Voice of America scripts if you don't mind traveling to Washington every week or so and visiting the Voice office during business hours.
example.arg: traveling to Washington every week or so and visiting the Voice office during business hours

example.name: mind-v: unstated or inconveniently-treed arg1
example.text: He said Apple's family of Macintosh computers, for instance, uses four different buses ``and [no one]-1 seems *trace*-1 to mind.''

roleset.name: take care of, tend to
roleset.note: MIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mind' based on sentences in corpus and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from mind.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: mind-v: mind the baby
example.text: The first episode concluded with a marvelously cute scene in which the trading-room crew minded a baby, the casualty of a broken marriage at the firm.
example.arg: a baby, the casualty of a broken marriage at the firm

roleset.name: make a note of, watch yourself!
roleset.note: MIND-V NOTES: This hardly even deserves to be called a predicate--it's more of afixed phrase. (from mind.03-v)

example.name: mind-v: funky inverted discourse function
example.text: A modest drop in the dollar -- only a modest one, *PRO* mind you -- would be welcomed by the U.S.

example.name: mind-v: another discourse syntax
example.text: *PRO* Mind you, most of ``the volunteers'' would be unskilled 17- to 18-year-olds, some not even high school graduates, and many saving money by living at home.

example.name: mind-v: never mind
example.text: As for Alberto Contador i do nt like cheats winning he should not of been in the tour last year never mind this year

roleset.name: opinion
roleset.note: MIND-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from mind.02-n) Expanded by Julia/Tim during MWE framing.

example.name: mind-n: change mind: arg 0
example.text: Is this going to change the mind of the one who killed you?
example.arg: of the one who killed you?

example.name: of_mind-m: of the mind that
example.text: I am of the mind that people should live life as though there is no heaven or hell.
example.arg: that people should live life as though there is no heaven or hell

roleset.name: have a particular mental property
roleset.note: MIND-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from mind.02-n)

example.name: minded-j: arg 0
example.text: It's good of you to try to be fair minded, but Gingrich made his Samsonite.

example.name: minded-j
example.text: He's really open - minded

roleset.name: be in one's general thoughts, contents of one's mental space
roleset.note: ON_ONES_MIND-M NOTES: Added by Julia/Tim during initial MWE framing.

example.name: on_mind-m
example.text: Carmelo Anthony says gold in the 2016 Olympics is on his mind.

example.name: mind-n: speak mind: arg1 examples
example.text: During his tenure as president, he spoke his mind about a variety of subjects

example.name: mind-n: speak mind: arg2 examples
example.text: Last November he spoke his mind to a convocation in New York

roleset.name: remember and consider
roleset.note: KEEP_IN_MIND-M NOTES: MWE frame by Julia/Tim.

example.name: keep_in_mind-m
example.text: *PRO* Keep in mind that many people have died for their beliefs
example.arg: that many people have died for their beliefs

example.name: bear_in_mind-m
example.text: They-1 had *PRO*-1 to bear in mind that long before the docks they had a free river, they had free water;
example.arg: that long before the docks they had a free river, they had free water

roleset.name: spontaneously think of
roleset.note: COME_TO_MIND-M NOTES: MWE frame by Julia/Tim.

example.name: come_to_mind-m, concatenation in arg2
example.text: The thought or temptation comes to mind that Louise likes to be in charge of things and wants power.
example.arg: [The thought or temptation][that Louise likes to be in charge of things and wants power]

example.name: spring_to_mind-m: args 1 and 2, arg1-poss
example.text: Musical ideas sprang to my mind like a flight of butterflies, and all I had to do was to stretch out my hand to catch them." - Charles Gounod.

example.name: pop_to_mind-m
example.text: I'll fling in whatever-1 *-1 pops to mind and sort the whole mess later.

example.name: bring_to_mind-m
example.text: Reading this brings to mind that Monty Python sketch from Life of Brian: 'Worse, how could it get any worse?'
example.arg: that Monty Python sketch from the Life of Brian: 'Worse, how could it get any worse?'

roleset.name: agreeing
roleset.note: OF_ONE_MIND-N NOTES: MWE frame by Julia, in progress.

example.name: of_one_mind-m
example.text: Political opposites, two Maine lawmakers are of one mind on medical marijuana.

example.name: of_same_mind-m
example.text: if the building project design process is to be beneficially integrated then everyone-1 needs *PRO*-1 to be of the same mind about the final building solution.

roleset.name: disagreeing
roleset.note: OF_TWO_MINDS-N NOTES: Added by Julia/Tim during initial MWE framing.

example.name: of_two_minds-m
example.text: The public is of two minds when it comes to trade with other countries.
example.arg: when it comes to trade with other countries

example.name: of_different_minds-m
example.text: We are of different minds on almost every subject.

roleset.name: decide
roleset.note: MAKE_UP_MIND-M NOTES: MWE frame by Julia, in progress.

role.descr: the decision itself, answer to the question
subject matter of the decision, question answered

example.name: make_up_mind-m: make up one's mind
example.note: This construction is currently tagged as compositional, with 'make_up' being covered by make_up.08.
example.text: Gilbert had finally made up his mind that he was going to be a doctor.
example.arg: that he was going to be a doctor

roleset.name: intend, desire to
roleset.note: HAVE_IN_MIND-M NOTES: Framed by Tim during MWE framing

example.name: have_mind-m: have a mind to
example.text: I have a mind to join a club and beat you over the head with it. Groucho Marx.
example.arg: to join a club and beat you over the head with it

example.name: have_in_mind-m: Arg 1
example.text: He had in mind to see his old high school teacher
example.arg: to see his old high school teacher

example.name: of_mind-m: of a mind to
example.text: If I were of a mind to defend Planned Parenthood, I think I would wait until all of the videos were released.

roleset.name: without distraction
roleset.note: Framed by Katie; merged into mind.xml during MWE framing

role.descr: entity with a one track mind

example.name: single_minded-j: Arg 1
example.text: we are single minded in our purpose to defeat terror and rise up against our enemy.
example.arg: in our purpose to defeat terror and rise up against our enemy

example.name: single-minded-j: arg1, concatenated rel
example.text: Although we could n't say they are as solid as one single iron plate , they are very stable and single - minded . For the record , American imperialists have absolutely no guts to invade such an opponent .
